name: Cruise Ship Boat Parking PRO - Full Version
name_original: Cruise Ship Boat Parking PRO - Full Version
description:
** THIS VERSION HAS NO IN GAME ADS **

Ever wondered if you could be the captain of your own luxury cruise ship? Think you got what it takes to park a enormous cruise ship?

However, once parked, you are not finished! You will then need to land a rescue helicopter on the cruise ship. Two times the parking, twice the fun.

FEATURES:

- Realistic 3D Graphics.
- 3 luxury cruise ships to choose from.
- Awesome helicopter landing challenge.
